references.paper_title: Improving image generation with better captions
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant due to its focus on enhancing image generation, a core topic of the main paper.
This is a foundational paper in large language models (LLMs), which are central to the proposed methodology.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This paper is foundational to text-to-image generation, forming a basis for the research presented.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces high-resolution image synthesis, which is directly relevant to the quality of images generated in the main study.

references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This work introduces CLIP, which is crucial for aligning text and image data, a key element of the discussed model
